text: Lloyd Edward Hampton (born June 18, 1941) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of Saskatchewan from 1982 to 1985, as a Progressive Conservative member for the constituency of Canora. He was briefly affiliated with the Western Canada Concept Party of Saskatchewan. ==References== Category:Progressive Conservative Party of Saskatchewan MLAs Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Western Canadian separatists Category:Western Canada Concept politicians
title: Lloyd Hampton
